description:
With a history that dates back more than 25 years, Kitay Law Offices in Chambersburg, Pennsylvania, has grown to become one of our state's most prominent and successful full-service law firms. With six total offices throughout Pennsylvania, we offer convenient access to a diverse range of clients throughout Franklin County and all across the state who have legal needs involving personal injury and motor vehicle accidents, workers' compensation, DUI and criminal defense, and immigration law.

This level of success did not happen by accident. It is the direct result of our lawyers' extensive legal experience and knowledge coupled with their unwavering commitment to our clients. To date, they have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff injury clients, and they have helped numerous others obtain the favorable outcomes they seek for their complex and pressing legal challenges as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

When you work with our legal team, you will receive highly personalized counsel directly from a top-ranked, local legal advocate who has your best interests at heart. Our attorneys are active members of various local, state and national legal organizations. They have also appeared on a variety of local and national news programs as well as online outlets, where they have offered in-depth legal commentary on a wide range of topics.

Honored for their outstanding professionalism and service, some of our lawyers have been selected for inclusion in Pennsylvania Super Lawyers' Rising Stars, an annual distinction given to the top 2.5% of attorneys in the state who are either 40 years old or younger or have been in practice for 10 years or less. Our law firm has also received dozens of positive testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

To discuss your needs with one of our attorneys, you can contact Kitay Law Offices by calling our office or visiting our website to receive a free initial consultation. We offer full bilingual services in English and Spanish as well as virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
